project_abstract.cdata: The Igdir-Aksu-Eregli-Ercis (IAEE) Irrigation Project supports the Government's efforts to accelerate completion of priority irrigation schemes. Four subprojects have been selected: Igdir, Aksu, Eregli and Ercis (IAEE) and for each the project will assist in financing: (i) completion of irrigation and drainage infrastructure; (ii) on-farm development works; (iii) strengthening of the extension system; (iv) operation and maintenance equipment; and (v) staff training. The project will also include preparation of an irrigation investment master plan and strategy review.
